txt.en: The cauldron appears to be empty, but it is extremely chill to the touch and smells of death
The top of this altar bears the mark of the Druggavar
The top of this altar bears the mark of the ox
The Slade of Shadows appears to be a focal point for the evil that is growing within the Gravenwood.
The top of this altar bears the mark of the stag

'Before I retreated to this rock, I was able to glimpse what appeared to be some small altars and a cauldron set between the large trees at the heart of the Slade. While you hunt the creatures within the Slade, try to get a glimpse at the structures... perhaps we can learn what purpose they serve.'

The cauldron and altars which Andreg mentioned can be found between the great trees at the heart of the Slade of Shadows.\n\nAndreg has instructed you to try and examine the altars and cauldron within the Slade of Shadows to learn what purpose they serve.
'Examine the altars and the cauldron, [placeholder]...I believe they may have something to do with the Old Woman of the Mountain.'
